name: py-singledispatch
description: This library brings functools.singledispatch to Python 2.6-3.3.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependencies.name: py-ordereddict
dependencies.description:
A drop-in substitute for Py2.7's new collections. OrderedDict that works
in Python 2.4-2.6.

dependent_to.name: py-numba
dependent_to.description: NumPy aware dynamic Python compiler using LLVM

dependent_to.name: py-tornado
dependent_to.description: Tornado is a Python web framework and asynchronous networking library.

dependent_to.name: py-rpy2
dependent_to.description:
rpy2 is a redesign and rewrite of rpy. It is providing a low-level
interface to R from Python, a proposed high-level interface, including
wrappers to graphical libraries, as well as R-like structures and
functions.

dependent_to.name: py-pydap
dependent_to.description: An implementation of the Data Access Protocol.

dependent_to.name: py-astroid
dependent_to.description:
A common base representation of python source code for pylint and other
projects.
